indicator_name: 성에 근거한 비차별과 평등을 증진, 집행, 모니터링 할 수 있는 수 있는 법적 체계 존재여부
target_name: 모든 곳에서 모든 여성과 여아에 대한 모든 형태의 차별 종식

en.target: End all forms of discrimination against all women and girls everywhere
en.title: Whether or not legal frameworks are in place to promote, enforce and monitor equality and non‑discrimination on the basis of sex

en.page_content:
**Non-statistical indicator**
▶ Data unavailable: There are currently no national statistics (Type 1), international statistics (Type 2), or alternative national statistics (Type 3) available. The Data of Type 1, type 2, or type 3 can be also included in case of temporary unavailability.
